testcase.classname: Home Page Verification,Search Functionality and product details verification
testcase.name: Search and apply filters for different products - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the homepage...........................................passed When the user enters "Health Book" in the search box........................passed And clicks the search button................................................passed And the user enables advanced search........................................passed And the user selects category "Books".......................................passed And the user sets the price range from 5 to 10..............................passed And the user clicks on the search button....................................passed Then the search results for "Health Book" should be displayed within the filters and clicked.passed And user clicks on Add to Cart button.......................................passed Then user verifies that the product is successfully added to the cart.......passed
